description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Tactical Measure is a forced scrolling music platformer designed to give players a new musical experience. In Tactical Measure, players will be challenged to not only complete the levels but also strive for the high score by collecting notes and jumping from platform to platform rhythmically to the music.
description.short: Tactical Measure is a forced scrolling music platformer designed to give players a new musical experience.
